numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed a pattern.
2. Many people are 15 to 24 years old.
3. Many people are 40 or more years old.
4. Typically, 15 to 24 year olds have a better outlook on the world than 40+ year olds.
5. Morocco is a country.
6. Nigeria is a country.
7. India is a country.
8. In Morocco, 40+ year olds think that the world is getting better more than 15 to 24 year olds think that the world is getting better.
9. In Nigeria, 40+ year olds think that the world is getting better more than 15 to 24 year olds think that the world is getting better.
10. In India, 40+ year olds think that the world is getting better more than 15 to 24 year olds think that the world is getting better.
11. I wonder which generation gave the 40+ generation a pessimistic view.
12. I wonder how 15 to 24 year olds feel about 40+ year olds.
13. I wonder what each generation thinks about other generations.
14. Some generations are not represented here.
15. This relates to my community.
16. I live in an area.
17. My area is rapidly expanding.
18. This also shows what young people think.
19. This also shows what old people think.
20. The headline is: The Future: Optimistic Or Pessimistic? Depends On Who You Ask.
